name: reXer
text:
—Good morning, [Player].
How was your sleep?

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text: This hotel's beds were really soft and comfortable, weren't they?

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text: Even though it's a location shoot, it's nice to travel sometimes. This planet has clean air, and it seeps into my head when I wake up—

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Ah, I feel so relaxed when the camera isn't rolling.
...Alright, let's do our best with the filming today too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text: This hotel's beds were really soft and comfortable, weren't they?

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text: Even though it's a location shoot, it's nice to travel sometimes. This planet has clean air, and it seeps into my head when I wake up—

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Ah, I feel so relaxed when the camera isn't rolling.
...Alright, let's do our best with the filming today too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm... I see, are you alright?
We're starting the mountain climbing shoot today, so don't overdo it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you can't sleep, come to my room next time.
Let's play games together until you get sleepy.

text:
As the two, who met in the hotel lobby, exchanged words,
Ryusei and Hitomi also appeared from the hallway beyond.

name: Hitomi
text:
Oh, good morning!
reXer-san, [Player]-san!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hey, good morning, you two.
It's a pleasant morning!
It makes me want to go for a run!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, good morning. Ryusei, Hitomi.
But first, why don't we talk?
How should we proceed with today's filming?

name: Hitomi
text:
Right, we can't have this conversation
once the camera starts rolling.
What should we do?

name: Ryusei
text:
Ganran-san will probably arrive soon, so once we meet up,
should we head straight for the volcano?

name: Hitomi
text:
That's a good idea, but
why don't we report on the village's situation first?

name: Hitomi
text:
Yesterday, we had a mission,
so we didn't get to look around the village much.

name: reXer
text:
I agree with Hitomi.
That way, the viewers will enjoy it more!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahah, reXer-kun, you're really motivated—!
Yeah, I have no problem with that either!
There were a lot of festival stalls too.

name: Ryusei
text:
Let's explore a bit, then suggest to
Ganran-san that we head to the volcano.
I'm looking forward to it—!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yay! Actually, there were so many shops I was curious about!
Is that okay with [Player]-san too?

options.text: I'll get some good shots today too!

text: Having decided on their plans, the four went outside.
Just then, Ganran, walking from the opposite street, noticed them and waved.

name: Ganran
text:
—Oh, you're early!
How was it, was it a good hotel?

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes! The Choco Volcano view from the room was also magnificent!
I took so many pictures!

name: Ryusei
text:
I was able to relax too—!
I should definitely feature it in ChocoFull too!

name: reXer
text:
Good morning, Ganran.
Um, it's sudden, but...

name: Ganran
text:
...Oh?
What is it?

reXer relayed the results of
their previous discussion to Ganran.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha, so that's it.
Ah, of course it's fine!
I was planning to guide you around the village anyway!

name: Ganran
text:
If there's anything you want to see,
just tell me, I'm your guide!
Just say anything you want!

name: reXer
text:
I see, that helps!
...Alright, today, for sure.

reXer clenched his fist slightly at Ganran,
who responded with a laugh.

Ryusei, who was watching from a little distance,
placed a hand on his chin.

name: Ryusei
text:
Oh, no, it's nothing big.
...I'm just a little concerned about reXer-kun.

name: Ryusei
text:
Somehow, today he's more enthusiastic than usual...
or rather, he looks desperate.

name: Ryusei
text:
I wondered if something happened, just a little, you know.
Well, I might be overthinking it, though!

With a gentle smile, Ryusei joined
Ganran and the others in their conversation.

name: Ryusei
text: Alright, then let's go report right away!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, [Player]-san,
please get the camera ready!

At [Player]'s signal, the hunters turned their gaze to the drone,
switching to their streamer expressions.

name: reXer
text:
—Alright, it's day two!
Let's go with enthusiasm!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, that's right!
Today, first, we'll report on the village's situation,
and then head straight to the volcano to look for rock cacao!

name: Hitomi
text:
First, let's look at the festival!
Ganran-san, thank you again today!

name: Ganran
text:
Yeah, leave it to me!
The whole village is prepared for the Choco Hunters!

Guided by Ganran's cheerful lead,
they headed towards the street lined with stalls,
where a sweet aroma welcomed the group.

name: Hitomi
text:
So cool!
There are so many sweets I've never seen before!

name: reXer
text:
Is this fruit?
The sauce on top looks like chocolate, though...

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, it's made by grinding the fruit and then adding sweetness,
so the way it's made might be similar to Earth's chocolate.

name: Ganran
text:
We bury the fruit in the ground and dry it with the volcano's geothermal heat.
Here, try it out, as they say, 'nothing ventured, nothing gained'!

name: Ryusei
text:
You dry it with ground heat?
That's a unique way of making it in Garunderra.
Alright, I'll have some!

name: Hitomi
text:
...So sweet!
But it's very delicious!

name: reXer
text:
The sourness of the fruit goes well with it!
And this food stall...

name: Ganran
text:
Oh, it's a meat dish using the same sauce!
That sweetness goes well with meat!

name: Ryusei
text:
O-Oh, you put it on meat too!?
It's such a sweet sauce, I wonder if it really goes well...?

The hunters commented wholeheartedly,
with lively expressions.

options.text: I wonder if he's relaxed now.

text:
[Player] observed reXer,
reminding themselves of Ryusei's words.

However, reXer and the others continued
their report without any particular problems.

name: Ryusei
text:
Phew, I'm full!
We ate a lot from the morning—!

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, today's a cheat day!
But we'll be climbing the mountain properly afterwards,
so we'll get our exercise in!

name: reXer
text:
...Alright!
Next, let's go check out that shop—
It was when reXer was about to turn the corner of the street.
—Ouch!

A boy appeared from around the corner,
bumped into reXer, and fell to the ground.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, s-sorry!
Are you alright...?

reXer hurriedly took the boy's hand
and slowly helped him up.

name: Boy
text:
Yeah, I'm fine. Sorry for suddenly bumping into you.
...Oh, you're the brothers who were looking for rock cacao yesterday!

name: Ryusei
text:
You're the one who told us about rock cacao, right!
Thank you for yesterday!

name: Hitomi
text: Thanks to you, we were able to clear the mission!

name: Boy
text:
...Hehehe.
Same here!

name: Boy
text:
...Hey, brothers.
Are you going to go collect rock cacao now?

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, that's right—.
We're going to make the phantom chocolate by hand!

name: Boy
text:
...I see.
Oh, um, can I come with you?

name: Boy
text:
I want to find it too.
Rock cacao!
I've been looking for it forever...
The boy looked up and gazed at Ryusei and the others.

name: Hitomi
text:
...Hmm, we're in the middle of filming, so
it might be a little difficult to go together?

name: Ryusei
text:
But why do you want rock cacao?
Do you want to eat the phantom chocolate too?

name: Boy
text:
Um... it's not that I want to eat it... but...
...Rock cacao chocolate, it's, um, it connects... so.

The boy, fidgeting, expressed that much,
then looked at Ryusei and the others.

options.text: Oh, that was a topic on Earth!

name: Hitomi
text:
It seems to be that story!
Making chocolate by hand with rock cacao,
and giving it to someone will connect you... that's it!

name: reXer
text:
I see, so that story is
also being told in Garunderra.

name: Boy
text:
Yeah, I've heard it since I was little...
...It's a fairy tale.

name: Boy
text:
You'll laugh at me if I say
I believe such a story, won't you?

name: Hitomi
text:
That's not true!
I think it's a very wonderful story!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, we wouldn't laugh.
What kind of story is it?
Could you tell us in detail?

At Ryusei's words, the boy let out
a small breath and began to speak.

name: Boy
text:
...Rock cacao chocolate, when made together,
binds you with an unbreakable "solid bond".

name: Boy
text:
Rock cacao is super hard, so making chocolate is really difficult...
It's important to overcome the difficulties together.

name: Boy
text:
Hey, on Earth, when you give chocolate, you...
...say 'I love you,' don't you?
I learned that yesterday.

name: Boy
text:
...I, too, um...
There's a girl I want to make it with, and I like her, so...
That's why... I was looking...

The boy muttered softly,
his voice almost fading away.

name: Ganran
text:
—Sorry, boy.
That's a request I can't grant.

Ganran opened his mouth towards the boy.
He continued in a very gentle, persuasive tone.

name: Ganran
text:
Iron Rule, number one.
If you want to climb the volcano, prepare first, alright?
Even if it hasn't erupted recently, it's still a volcano.

name: Ganran
text:
The path is steep in many places,
and it might be a bit dangerous.
I can't let you get hurt.

name: Ganran
text:
Besides, there's a show being recorded for the
people who came all the way from Earth.
Can't you understand, too?

name: Boy
text:
...You're right.
No, I'm sorry.

name: reXer
text:
There will be another chance.
You'll surely find the rock cacao too.

name: Boy
text:
...Yeah, thank you.
But, still... it's fine.
...That earlier one was just a "fairy tale," after all.

name: Boy
text:
I... even if I make chocolate,
I might not be able to say I like them.
Honestly, I'm not confident...

name: Boy
text:
Even if I tell them, it might not work.
What's the point, someone like me...
They won't even bother.

name: Ryusei
text:
"I can't do it"
"Someone as boring and gloomy as me"
"What's the point", "someone like me"...

name: Ryusei
text:
...Um, you know.
.........

Ryusei tried to say something, but no words followed.
The boy shook his head lightly and smiled.

name: Boy
text:
...People from Earth are amazing, aren't they?
They give chocolate and can actually say they like someone.
Good luck, brothers.
After saying that, the boy ran off at a trot.

name: Hitomi
text:
...Hmm, it's a shame, but
let's do our best for that child's sake too.
Right, Ryusei-san?

name: Ryusei
text:
...Eh, ah, yeah, that's right!
We've reported on the village's situation, so
should we head to the volcano soon?

name: reXer
text:
Ah... that's right!
Let's go find that rock cacao!

name: Ganran
text:
Yeah, then let's head out!
As I told the boy,
there are some rough paths along the way.

name: Ganran
text:
Just don't get hurt!
Well, I'm sure the heroes will be fine, though!

name: Ganran
text:
[Player], you also gotta be very careful.
Alright, then, let's go!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes!
Let's head out!

With Ganran and Hitomi leading, [Player] followed,
and the group left the village and proceeded.

Behind them, Ryusei began to walk as if he had made a decision.
And even further behind—

name: reXer
text:
It was going so well, but...
Bumping into a civilian doesn't leave a good impression, does it...

name: reXer
text:
Not yet, I need to be better...
"If it were my dad"—

Chapter 3:
About Future and Dreams

The group, having arrived at the foot of the volcano from the village,
searched for a rock cacao vein and proceeded with Ganran's guidance.

name: Ganran
text:
The mountain path is getting pretty serious,
but if you start feeling tired,
just tell me right away.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, thank you, Ganran.
But we're also heroes of NeoTalents!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, this kind of path is no problem,
I could walk it forever!
Leave it to these muscles!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha, that's a good spirit!
With that much enthusiasm, there'll be no problem!
How about you, Hito-chan, are you alright?

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, I also train daily with dance and singing!
Being an idol is also a test of stamina!

name: Hitomi
text:
Besides, I'm quite confident in my strength!
But—

Hitomi narrowed her eyes and
fanned herself with her hand.

name: Hitomi
text: It's so hot here...

After entering the volcano path, the temperature suddenly rose,
and a heat like midsummer assaulted the group.

name: Ryusei
text:
The mountain path aside,
this area is hot enough to make you sweat.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, there's geothermal heat from the volcano.
It's like a bedrock bath...

name: Hitomi
text:
Ganran-san, are you alright carrying
so much luggage in this heat?
I'll help you!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, that large luggage you're carrying is for mining, right?
We'll help carry it too.

name: Ganran
text:
Ohoho, thank you, reXer, Hito-chan.
But, I'm fine!
I usually train like this, you see!

Saying that with a grin,
Ganran waved his hand at Hitomi and the others.

On his back, bundled together,
were mining tools, probably enough for everyone.

name: Ganran
text:
The weight of the luggage and the heat of the volcano...
Ah, it's unbearable...!
It's just right for enduring!

name: Ganran
text:
That's right, if I can endure today what
I couldn't yesterday, then that's growth, isn't it?

name: Ganran
text: To feel that strength in my own body is what I like!

name: Ganran
text:
In short, it's an endurance contest with myself!
How about it, isn't it unbearable?
Gahahaha!

name: reXer
text:
An endurance contest, huh...
My field is in gaming, but I can understand a similar feeling.

name: reXer
text:
When I defeat a stage I couldn't clear, or a boss I couldn't beat,
I really feel like I've grown, and it's refreshing.

name: Ryusei
text:
I feel the same way when
I push myself during muscle training—!

name: Ryusei
text:
It's called 'all-out' in the
sense of surpassing your limits.

name: Ryusei
text:
Thinking of that word,
I train myself to do one more rep, just one more!

name: Ganran
text:
All-out, huh, that's a good word!
Maybe I should do some muscle training to strengthen my endurance—
Oh?

As the group proceeded along the mountain path,
two diverging paths and two suspicious-looking boards appeared before them.

Large boards were placed to block the path.
At the fork, one person stood.

name: reXer
text:
...H-hey, everyone.
That "person"...

name: Hitomi
text:
Hmm...
Looks suspicious.
Definitely one of the organizers, let's be careful!

name: Ryusei
text:
Whoa—!
Is it some kind of recreation?
I'm looking forward to what happens!

As the person who seemed to be the organizer displayed three different reactions,
they recognized the hunters and approached them.

name: Stuntman
text:
—Choco Hunters.
Welcome to Choco Volcano.
Ehm... ahem.

name: Stuntman
text:
Show us the power of the hunters' bond!
NeoTalents Presents!
It's time for 'Hot! Hero Quiz'!

name: All Three
text:
H-Hot...
Hero, Quiz!?

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
A trial for the hunters!

name: Ganran
text:
Well then, I'll step back,
and enjoy watching!

options.text: It's starting to feel like a real show!

name: Stuntman
text:
From this point on, a quiz will be given to deepen your bond,
which cannot be answered unless you know each other well.

name: Stuntman
text:
Answerers, please jump towards the
board that has the correct answer.

name: Stuntman
text:
You can proceed if you answer correctly,
but if, by any chance, you make a mistake—

name: reXer
text:
.........
...Wh-What happens if we make a mistake?

name: Stuntman
text:
Beyond the incorrect board is
a very hot natural hot spring.
Please make a grand dive if you do.

name: All Three
text: W-What!?

name: Stuntman
text:
Also, for this program, we have specially
rented out the entire volcano's hot spring.

name: Stuntman
text:
Diving into the hot spring would be a nuisance to those around,
so viewers, especially good children, please do not imitate.

name: Hitomi
text:
W-Wait a minute!
If I dive into the hot spring,
my bangs might get messed up...!!

name: Stuntman
text:
Please consider that part of the charm.
Even if you get wet,
the geothermal heat here should dry you quickly.

name: Stuntman
text:
Now then, let's begin right away.
Everyone watching,
please think along with us.

name: Stuntman
text:
—Question 1!
Let's have fun first!
reXer-san, who is active as a cyber hero!

name: Stuntman
text:
What is the professional gamer team he belongs to?
Hitomi-san, please!

name: Hitomi
text: Eh, m-me...!?

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, go for it, Hito-chan!
I'm cheering for you—!

name: reXer
text:
It's about my affiliation.
That's easy, my game case is—

name: Stuntman
text:
Oops.
Everyone from NeoTalents,
no hints, please!

name: Hitomi
text:
W-What should I do...!
Then, is it okay if I get a hint from [Player]-san?

name: Stuntman
text:
...Hmm.
Well, that's fine!
Please, assist them.

name: Hitomi
text:
With [Player]-san, I'm sure it'll be fine!
Please help me!

name: Hitomi
text:
I'll run towards the panel
that [Player]-san indicates!

name: Stuntman
text:
Have you finished discussing?
Then, Hitomi-san,
please give your answer!

name: Hitomi
text:
O-Okay...!
[Player]-san, here I go!
The answer is—

Hitomi, as if making a decision,
looked up and ran towards the board [Player] indicated.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Th-That was good—!
I didn't get wet...!
Heheh, that's correct!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san, thank you!
You saved me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, that's correct, Hitomi!
I belong to μ-Hyperions.

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It means "one who masters the micro and goes to great heights".
Heheh, how about it, isn't that cool?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Kyaa—!?
Oh no, I'm soaking wet...
I failed...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, but it's a bit hot, but
the temperature is just right!
If only it wasn't this situation...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san, please don't worry!
Let's do our best next time!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A-Are you alright, Hitomi!
My affiliation is μ-Hyperions.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hito-chan, here's a towel! The other path was the correct one. Let's go that way.

text:
Proceeding down the correct path,
they found two more boards similar to the previous ones.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
There are boards, so it's another quiz!
This time, who is it about?

name: Stuntman
text:
—Second question!
Ayauta Hitomi-san, also known as Hito-chan,
who is active as an idol!

name: Stuntman
text:
What is her favorite food?
Ryusei-san, please!

name: Ryusei
text:
Oh, it's my turn now, is it?
Hito-chan's favorite thing...
[Player]-san, do you know?

name: Ryusei
text:
If you don't mind, I'd be happy if you could lend me your strength!
Tell me which panel it is!

Saying that, Ryusei lightly ran forward and
jumped towards the board [Player] indicated.

name: Ryusei
text: —The answer is this way!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Alright, that's correct!
Hito-chan did happily talk about having a sweets report shoot!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san, thank you too.
Thanks to you, I didn't get wet—!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text: Yes, it's sweet and delicious, of course, but it's also cute, and the cream and sponge are so fluffy, I love it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...I love beef jerky too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Hm?
Hitomi, did you say something?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, I didn't say anything!
Come on, let's move on!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Whoa!?
Hahaha, I got soaking wet!
I thought it was correct—!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I thought it was this way too, so
[Player]-san, don't worry about it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, idols like cute things!
Also, Ryusei-san, reXer-san, could you lend me your ears for a moment?
While mindful of the microphone, Hitomi whispered quickly into their ears.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text: I really, really love beef jerky, but cake is cuter, isn't it... Please keep this a secret from everyone!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, so that's what it was.
Yeah, I get it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-is that something to worry about so much...?
But if Hitomi thinks so, I'll keep quiet.
Here, Ryusei, use this towel.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, thank you!
That was a good hot bath—!
Alright, let's go the other way!

text:
The group proceeded down the correct path.
Of course, another set of identical boards appeared ahead.

name: reXer
text:
They've appeared again.
Which means the next quiz is...

As the hunters nodded to each other,
the staff member began to read the question.

name: Stuntman
text:
—Third question!
Ryusei-san, also known as Ryusei,
who is active as a fitness model!

name: Stuntman
text:
What is his proudest possession?
This one's a bit difficult, but...
reXer-san, please!

name: reXer
text:
It's my turn.
Ryusei's proudest possession, huh...

name: reXer
text:
Come on, [Player]!
My life is in your hands too!
...Alright, I'm going!

reXer dashed straight ahead and jumped
without hesitation towards the board [Player] indicated.

name: reXer
text: —The answer is this one!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Whoa!?
N-No way!?
Ugh, I'm soaking wet...

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], let's use this frustration to our advantage next time!
Don't worry about it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hahaha, the physique competition I'm in requires wearing surf shorts during the competition.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I started collecting them because it was fun to look at—!
When new ones come out, I just can't help but buy them!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My costumes also change depending on the song, so I totally understand that feeling!
I sometimes buy too much, though!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
reXer-san, let's go shopping together next time!
Here, please use this towel!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, thank you.
It's a good hot spring, but I'd like to soak in it slowly...
Alright, let's go the other way.

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Alright, that's correct!
It's thanks to [Player]!
Thank you for the advice!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ryusei does physique, so it's something he wears during that, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, that's right—!
In physique competitions, the impression of your surf shorts is very important!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I started having fun researching them, and now
I've filled up one whole room—!
When new ones come out, I just can't help but buy them—!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hitomi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A whole room of surf shorts!?
Heheh, that's "love" right there!

text:
After the hunters passed through the correct path,
Ganran's boisterous voice could be heard.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
All four of you, good work!
It seems this is the end!

As they reunited and talked,
the staff member from before approached them.

name: Stuntman
text:
—Congratulations!
You have finally conquered all the quizzes!

name: Stuntman
text:
This should have deepened your bond with each other!
...Now then, please look ahead.

On the ground indicated by the staff member,
a part of what appeared to be glittering, jewel-like ore was visible.

name: Stuntman
text:
Just now, another staff member
has discovered a vein of rock cacao!

name: All Three
text: R-Rock cacao!?

name: reXer
text:
H-hey!
Is that the real thing...!?
It might be a trap...

name: Ryusei
text:
Hmm, it's mostly buried in the ground so I can't tell, but
it seems to be just like they said in the story...

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, no doubt about it!
That's definitely genuine rock cacao!

name: Stuntman
text:
However, we staff members have also proceeded
with excavation, ahead of the hunters!

name: Stuntman
text:
Now, at this rate, the buried
rock cacao will be taken by them!
Now is the time to show the power of your deepened bonds!

At those words, the staff members who were
excavating stopped and turned to face the hunters.

And, while still poised,
they slowly closed the distance.

name: reXer
text:
...It seems they're serious.
[Player]!
Let's fight back!

name: Ryusei
text:
That's right, sorry for having you find it,
but we'll be taking that rock cacao!

name: Hitomi
text: Yes, we can't hand over the rock cacao!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha, it's a battle!
Then I'll help too!

name: Ganran
text:
Seeing passionate people always makes me excited!
Let's transform together!
Seeing the three prepare, Ganran also grinned and waved to [Player] as a signal.

name: Stuntman
text:
...Eh, the guide is fighting too?
Well, whatever...
It looks fun, so it's OK!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha, it's not bad, is it?
Leave it to me!
[Player] switched the filming drone to auto-follow and entered operation mode.
And, they transformed the heroes all at once.

name: Ryusei
text:
Alright—!
Time to get the first rock cacao—!

name: Hitomi
text:
I'll do my best too!
Everyone watching,
please cheer us on—!

name: Ganran
text:
I'm fired up and boiling over!
I'll enjoy myself too!

name: reXer
text:
I'll definitely make this work and get the rock cacao!
...Alright, quest start!
Battle Start

name: Hitomi
text: Heheh, I'll sing my song for you—!

name: Hitomi
text:
Here I go!
—"Love Song"!
LOVE ME☆HITO-MI~!
Hitomi's singing voice echoed through the sky of Choco Volcano.

Her voice, amplified through her Parallel Weapon,
resonated as if to encourage the surrounding heroes.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
So this is Hito-chan's song!
I feel power surging through me!

name: Ganran
text:
I'll show them I'm a fighting guide!
—Take that!
Not missing the moment the staff flinched from Ganran's attack, Ryusei and reXer leaped simultaneously.

name: Ryusei
text:
Hito-chan, Ganran-san, thank you!
Alright, reXer-kun,
let's finish this together—!

name: reXer
text:
Alright, leave it to me, Ryusei!
This quest is ours—!

name: Stuntman
text: ...Ugh, whoa!

When the two attacked simultaneously, the staff members
lost their balance and staggered back in retreat.

[Player] de-transformed the heroes who
had finished the battle, and handed them towels.

name: reXer
text:
Thank you, [Player].
That was a nice game, everyone!
Now we can get the rock cacao!

name: Ryusei
text:
Phew, that was good exercise!
Fighting in such a hot place, I'm drenched in sweat—!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah...
It's really hitting my latissimus dorsi...!
I think my muscles are going to become even more beautiful!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
Oh yeah, Ryusei, you said something like that during our battle too!

name: Ganran
text:
It's a good thing to be able to acknowledge yourself!
Your body is beautiful, you know!

name: Ryusei
text:
Thank you, Ganran-san!
I want to become even more beautiful!

name: Hitomi
text:
I understand how Ryusei-san feels!
I think it's wonderful!

name: Ganran
text:
Speaking of which, Hitomi-chan,
you fought in this volcanic path, yet
there's not a speck of dust on you.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, it was quite an intense battle in this heat, I think...
And your hair isn't even messed up.

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, no matter what happens,
an idol's bangs are never allowed to get messed up!
Hitomi struck a small pose and smiled at the camera.

name: Ryusei
text:
Hito-chan always uses a lot of hairspray
before her battle live performances—

name: Hitomi
text:
Kyaa—!?
No, Ryusei-san—!!
Don't expose an idol's secrets—!!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Eh, ah, s-sorry!
I guess that was something I shouldn't have said.

name: Hitomi
text:
Secrets are part of being an idol!
Please cut that out in editing—!!
Now, instead of my story, let's talk about the rock cacao!

Hitomi, desperately protesting,
pointed to the ore at her feet.

There, a part of the rock cacao was exposed,
but most of it was still buried in the ground.

name: Ganran
text:
That's right, let's harvest this before we forget!
...Here, let's use this pickaxe!

Ganran took out a pickaxe from the large luggage
he had been carrying on his back and handed it to the hunters.

name: Ganran
text:
Iron Rule, number one!
'He who does not work, neither shall he eat!'
You'll have to dig it up yourselves!

name: Ganran
text:
Rock cacao is extremely hard, so
it won't get damaged even if you hit it a bit, but
you need to be careful when digging it out!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, leave it to me!
Then, first, let's dig it up by clearing
the surrounding soil so as not to hit it!

name: Ryusei
text:
Alright—!
It's time for my trapezius muscles to shine!

reXer and Ryusei swung the pickaxes
they received from Ganran towards the ground.

name: reXer
text:
Tch... the ground layer is quite hard, isn't it.
Even though I'm putting in effort,
it's not scraping off easily...

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
You can't dig it out that easily!
That's why it's called "rock cacao"!

name: Hitomi
text:
He who does not work, neither shall he eat, right!
Alright, can I try too?

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, it requires quite a bit of strength—!
Could Hito-chan please take this side?

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, leave it to me!
Here I go—!
...Aiyah—!!
The pickaxe Hitomi swung down literally "gouged" the ground near the rock cacao.
And, unable to withstand the applied force, the metal part of the pickaxe deformed and burst into pieces.

options.text: As expected of Hito-chan, that's great!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player], that reaction, you are used to this!?

options.text: Looks like we're almost able to dig it up!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player], that reaction, you are used to this!?

name: Hitomi
text:
...I-I'm so sorry!
I broke the tool you so kindly lent me...!

name: Hitomi
text:
Ganran-san made it, didn't he...
I'll return it right away...!
I'm truly sorry!

name: Ganran
text:
...Eh? Ah, ah!
I can reforge that, so it's fine!

name: Ganran
text:
You don't have to force yourself to put it back together,
just hand it to me, okay?
You might get hurt, you know!

name: Ganran
text:
I'll fix this tomorrow, but...
Here, look at the ground, Hito-chan.
Once you've come this far, the rest is easy!

Collecting the broken pickaxe,
Ganran pointed to the rock cacao.

There, nearly half of the rock cacao was already exposed,
shining brilliantly as it caught the light.

options.text: It's beautiful enough to be rumored about!

name: Hitomi
text:
—So beautiful, so pure...!
This is rock cacao...!

name: Ryusei
text:
It really looks like a jewel—!
I still can't believe this is food—!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, it really sparkles and reflects light like this, doesn't it.
As expected of a rare item!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha, right?
Be careful not to damage it
until the very end when you excavate it!

The hunters sighed, gazing at the rock cacao and its beauty.
Among them, Ryusei—

name: Ryusei
text:
.........
...Hey, everyone!
I have a favor to ask!

name: Ryusei
text:
—Hey—!
Kid, wait a minute—!

The group, who had brought the rock cacao back to the village,
was looking for a certain person.

name: Boy
text:
...Eh, me?
What's wrong, big brothers...?

That person was the boy from the village
they had met earlier in the day.

name: Ryusei
text:
Good—!
I finally found you—!
I was looking for you!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Here, this.
You've been looking for it, haven't you?

Ryusei carefully handed the rock cacao
he had been holding to the boy's palm.

name: Boy
text:
...Th-this is rock cacao!?
Why—!? Is it really okay?
It's not something you'd find...!

name: reXer
text:
Ryusei said he really wanted to give it to you.
We agree too!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, we, the "ChocoFull" members,
came from Earth to spread the culture of love and feelings.

name: Hitomi
text:
With this rock cacao,
please make chocolate filled with your feelings,
and give it to your important person!

The hunters also happily followed Ryusei.
Ganran patted the bewildered boy's shoulder and grinned.

name: Ganran
text:
You did it!
Now you can make the phantom chocolate yourself!

name: Boy
text:
B-but...!
You worked so hard to find it, didn't you...?

name: Ryusei
text:
...Earlier today, you said it, didn't you?
"What's the point?"

Ryusei met the boy's gaze and looked at the rock cacao
shining in the setting sun in the boy's arms.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I, too, used to have no confidence in myself.
Those words... used to be my catchphrase.

name: Ryusei
text:
I had a gloomy personality, no stamina,
hated even looking in the mirror...
I thought I had no good qualities at all.

name: Ryusei
text:
But, that's why I understand your feelings a little.
It's scary, isn't it, to take courage.

name: reXer
text: Ryusei...

At Ryusei's words, reXer let out a small gasp of surprise
and clutched his chest as if thinking of something.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I was scared too. But,
because I had the courage to take a step forward
and decide to change, the me now exists.

name: Ryusei
text:
How about it, the me now, isn't bad, right?
I love the me I am now, who I became through effort!
Ryusei smiled broadly and squeezed the boy's hand.

name: Ryusei
text: I think you can also find that courage.

name: Ryusei
text:
So, this rock cacao is just the beginning.
You still have to make a lot of effort from now on.

name: Ryusei
text:
I hope you make delicious chocolate with this cacao, with that person!
Do your best to convey your feelings—!

The boy squeezed Ryusei's hand back tightly.
He looked back at Ryusei directly with eyes still showing surprise.

name: Boy
text:
Th-thank you... very much.
...I'll do my best!

name: Boy
text:
...So I can tell you all,
that I did my best!

name: Hitomi
text: Heheh, thank you for your wonderful reply!

name: reXer
text: Ah, I'm looking forward to hearing those words!

The hunters said goodbye to the boy,
who was happily waving his hands,
and began to walk away.

name: Ryusei
text:
...Sorry, both of you,
I know we finally got it, but
you indulged my selfishness.

name: Hitomi
text:
That's not true!
Our mission is to spread the culture of love.
With this, we were able to give back some "love", weren't we!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, I wanted to give something back
to the villagers for welcoming us too!

name: Ryusei
text:
"Returning love," huh...
Yeah, that's right!

name: Ryusei
text:
I talked a lot with that kid, but
I myself feel like I can become even more wonderful—!

name: Ryusei
text:
Thank you, both of you!
And [Player]-san and Ganran-san too!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
We can just go get more rock cacao tomorrow!

[Player] stopped the drone camera
and changed it to charging mode.

name: Ganran
text:
Alright, it's time to break up for today.
Good work today, Hunters!
...Oh?

Just then, the ground suddenly shook,
and the group cried out in surprise.

name: Hitomi
text:
E-earthquake!?
Ah—, that surprised me...

name: reXer
text:
It seems to have stopped now.
It wasn't that big, but
is everyone okay?

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, I'm fine.
[Player]-san too...
Good, you seem okay.

name: Ganran
text:
Well, earthquakes happen often on Garunderra, so you'll get used to them soon!
No need to worry about it!

name: Ganran
text:
Now, I'm going to stop by the sauna after this,
and try to shake off some of this fatigue.
How about you all?

name: Ganran
text:
Garunderra has plenty of volcanoes, you know!
This area in particular is famous for its natural saunas!

name: Ryusei
text:
Oh, a natural sauna, huh—!
It sounds like it'd warm your body and make you feel refreshed!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, we were filming on a mountain path, after all.
To be able to do our best tomorrow too,
should we go before returning to the hotel?

name: Hitomi
text:
Ugh... It's really unfortunate, but
I have a personal live stream after this,
so I have to return to the hotel first.

name: Hitomi
text:
So, I'm sorry, but
please enjoy yourselves.
Tell me all about it later!

name: reXer
text:
I see, understood.
[Player], how about you?
Would you like to join us?
